titleStmt.title: Memorials of the method and maner of proceedings in Parliament in passing bills Together with several rules and customs, which by long and constant practice have obtained the name of Orders of the House. Gathered by observation, and out of the journal books from the time of Edward 6. By H. S. E. C.P.
titleStmt.author: Scobell, Henry, d. 1660.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Henry Hills and John Field, printers to His Highness,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
